item.title: Aunt Jo's Christmas Ricotta Cookies
item.description: Everybody has an aunt with their own way of making those Italian Christmas cookies. And I’ve discovered that my Aunt Jo has at some point shifted to a second recipe. The time of transition is unknown, and which is the old/new version is a mystery; I simply refuse to ask, because I haven’t noticed the difference over time, and I can only dream that I grew on on a “better cookie”, whicher it may be.
